products.name: Iphone 17 Air
products.features:
256 GB ROM,
16.51 cm (6.5 inch) Super Retina XDR Display,
48MP + 48MP | 18MP Front Camera,
A19 Chip, 6 Core Processor Processor
products.description: The iPhone 17 Air is an ultra-thin and light iPhone model featuring a 6.5-inch ProMotion display, the A19 Pro chip, a titanium body, and a single 48MP rear camera.
